#summary Helper components for serializating objects to NSString and vice-versa

= Introduction =

This section contains [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Serializer utility components] for [https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/Cocoa/Reference/Foundation/Classes/NSString_Class/Reference/NSString.html NSString] to object and vice-versa serialization.


= Details =

Components in this section include:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Serializer/OxICSerializer.h OxICSerializer], which is a common protocol to be implemented by serializers.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Serializer/OxICJsonSerializer.m OxICJsonSerializer], a JSON serializer implementation.
  * XML serializer: Some day!!! :P
